mapper.select: SELECT ac.code_no, ai.item_id, ai.item_nm, ai.item_content, ai.item_isactive FROM apply_item ai JOIN apply_code ac ON ai.apply_no = ac.apply_no WHERE ai.apply_no = #{applyNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO apply_item (apply_no, item_id, item_nm, item_content, item_isactive, item_isupdate) VALUES (#{applyNo}, #{itemId}, #{itemNm}, #{itemContent}, #{itemIsActive}, #{itemIsUpdate})
INSERT INTO item (code_no, item_id, item_nm, item_content, item_isactive) VALUES (#{codeNo}, #{itemId}, #{itemNm}, #{itemContent}, #{itemIsActive})
